Kapcsolat
O365 Privacy/Compliance Engineer állás Budapest
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, UK and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil and Iberia and an Asset Management organization with locations in UK, US, NL and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, we foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. We are a people business, and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / RequirementsQualifications and Skills
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent knowledge in information technology or risk management/controls
Excellent communication skills in writing and communication information in a clear, concise manner.
Proven analytical, critical thinking and problem-solving skills 
Preferred Qualifications:
An understanding of Microsoft Security technologies
Candidates should possess a working knowledge of Office 365 Services including Microsoft Purview
Subject Matter Expertise in Security, Compliance, and Management including the compliance aspects of managed services.
Deep knowledge of compliance certifications (ISO, SOC, FedRAMP, HIPAA, DFARS)
Enhanced decision making and problem-solving skills.
Reliable level of interpersonal and communication skills and demonstrate a self-driven, proactive work ethic.
Capacity to stay committed to the task even during times of frequent change or information delays.
Four-year Computer Science or related degree or equivalent work experience.
Must be a self-starter and can work independently or as part of a team
Select, manage, and lead discussions with customers to ensure that compliance obligations are understood and achievable in the Office 365 Services
Provide subject matter expertise to business unit data privacy officers with the understanding of various compliance obligations, and working with them to develop roadmaps to achieve these compliance requirements.
Amit kínálunk / OfferOn a day-to-day basis, this position will perform responsibilities such as some or all the following:
Office 365 Security and Governance documentation
Tenant Security Design
Office 365 Security Design
Email Security Design
Power Platform Design
Implements and manages security and compliance controls within Microsoft 365 (M365).
Implements and manages information protection within M365 to adhere to corporate DLP (Data Loss Prevention) policies.
Working through PIA requests – OneTrust
Any requests that come from Security and Compliance Team
Security team does not have full access to Office 365 services and this responsibility would hold the permissions to run reports and work a long Security team during a SOC event.
Support forensic investigations
Detect, investigate, and take action on critical risks in your organization, including data theft, data leaks, and security policy violations.
Understanding the Retention\Deletion\Label policies
Work with BIGid Project Team to understand and align both teams roadmaps
Understanding the work being done in the Microsoft Defender
Own Microsoft 365/Office 365 documentation that sits in the BDR site
Update OneTrust Office 365 Services
PIA requests
Understanding E-Discovery
Help push cleanup of ShareFile dormant accounts
Manage - Service Now - Application IT Compliance Data for the Office 365 services
Assistance with Managing Risks related to Security and Compliance
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment

iOS Developer állás Budapest
iOS
Firebase
Swift
Mobil fejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.Elvárások / Requirements
5+ years of iOS development experience
a solid knowledge of iOS native frameworks, tools, and development techniques like (Swift 5, ReSwift, RxSwift, Alamofire, Firebase, Socket.IO)
knowledge of SwiftUI design principles, patterns, and best practices is a plus
familiarity with RESTful APIs
excellent communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have
experience in working in distributed teams
Amit kínálunk / OfferIn your daily work you will:
create a new app from scratch
design, develop, maintain features that meets high quality standards
provide unit tests to verify your implementation
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
investigate, analyze, and fix incidents and performance issues from production
collaborate with the customer and project leadership in Switzerland
create demos and present to clients
give and receive constructive feedback 
work in a hybrid working model
Kapcsolattartó / InformationContinuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.Elvárások / Requirements
confident knowledge of front-end development (Javascript, React / Angular)
good communication skills in English (spoken and written)
a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have
familiarity with relational databases
experience in working in distributed teams
Confident knowledge of OOP (Java is a plus)
Amit kínálunk / OfferIn your daily work, you will
develop effective solutions for complex business problems in various industries
integrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectures
you will design responsive front end applications
participate in important project milestones; like estimation, releases, elaboration, etc.
maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)
give and receive constructive feedback
Kapcsolattartó / InformationContinuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist

Software Test Engineer állás Budapest
C
C#
Python
Matlab
Tesztelés állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. With its comprehensive technology portfolio, the company offers integrated solutions for established vehicle manufacturers, mobility providers and start-up companies in the fields of transportation and mobility.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
University/College degree in Vehicle Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, or Computer Science
Good command of English and/or German, both written and spoken
Basic knowledge/understanding of coding, scripting, programming (Python, C, C#, C++ or other)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Experience in automotive function or system development
User-level knowledge of Matlab / Simulink, Vector tools (CANalyzer, CANape development tools)
Category C driving license
Amit kínálunk / OfferThe following challenges await our new Software Test Engineer:
Execution of tests using HIL (Hardware-In-the-Loop) simulators in the field of conventional and hybrid truck transmissions
Manual and automated evaluation of measurements (using Vector tools such as CANape, CANalyzer; FAMOS)
Development and execution of automated tests
Documentation and presentation of test results
Improvement of tests and testing strategies
Collaboration in an international team
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Participation in international projects and missions abroad
Training programs and language courses opportunities
Excellent workplace atmosphere and attractive working environment
Competitive salary, performance-related bonus and cafeteria
Different sports options
School start support

IT Architect (.NET) állás Budapest
Angular
C#
net
remote
Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They are looking for a new senior colleague to join their team in the following position:
IT ARCHITECTElvárások / RequirementsRequirements you should fulfill:
At least a Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in IT
At least 3 years of experience in a similar position (Lead software developer, IT Architect etc.)
Some experience in agile software development
Practical experience with Azure, DevOps, .NET, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Familiarity with the fundamentals of Data Science, Machine Learning, AI, and MLOps
A good understanding of low-level communication protocols.
Excellent verbal and written English language skills (German is a plus)
Soft skills we look for:
Team player attitude 
A result-oriented and systematic work approach
Excellent conceptual skills and an ability to structure complex topics
Autonomous, self-driven, flexible, reliable, and keen to push things forward
Amit kínálunk / OfferYour focus will be:
Architectural design for industry 4.0 solutions using domain-driven design and microservice architecture patterns
Design and development of a computer vision/AI solution framework - including machine learning, backend and frontend development, corresponding DevOps and automation tasks
Design of technical solution architectures based on Microsoft Azure services, Databricks, .NET / C#, Angular, Kubernetes and Terraform
Working together with other professionals like product owners, business experts, solution architects and the development team to engineer solutions aligned with architecture guidelines.
Documentation and presenting results to the program leadership and stakeholders
Steering of the development team, orchestration of activities during the sprint and assurance of quality of results
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Home office or remote work opportunity
A job full of challenges and high-level professional activities
Stable international company background
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support

Lead Data Engineer állás Országos
GIT
Unity
C
Python
SQL
Scala
Apache
remote
Rendszer / Hálózat, DevOps állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Partner provides customized property management service, and have leading role in the market. We are looking for their expanding international team a Lead Data Engineer colleague, with the following tasks:Elvárások / Requirements
Extensive experience (3+ years) developing data integrations against different sources including flat file, API and database using one or more industry standard toolsets e.g., Databricks, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse, Google Dataflow, Apache Beam, Talend, Spark, Jupyter Notebooks, SSIS, Informatica, etc.
Recent, hands-on commercial experience (1+ year) building data integration processes using Databricks and Azure Data Factory v2 or Azure Synapse
Solid coding experience in at least one language commonly used in data cleansing, wrangling and statistical analysis (Python, Scala, R, etc.)
Above average knowledge of using SQL to query data, troubleshoot common data issues, and summarise or aggregate data to derive new insights, extracting value from raw data
Some exposure to building and deploying cloud-native data solutions in Azure including Data Lake, Azure Key Vault, Function Apps and Azure SQL Database
Broad understanding of the principles of data warehouse design and data integration processes to extract, transform, cleanse, and prepare data for BI reporting and advanced analytics
Routine use of source control (Git, SVN, TFS, etc) as part of regular development activities, branching & merging, pull requests
Experience gathering, analysing, and documenting requirements, scoping, planning, and managing the delivery of data integration projects
Proven experience troubleshooting and resolving data, integration, and code issues. Debugging, identifying bugs, and driving them to closure by working closely with the rest of the team
Demonstrate strong communication skills documenting business processes in the form of process maps and step-by-step user manuals. data analysis, definition of workarounds, etc
Familiarity with test management (UAT, unit testing, system integration testing and release to live processes), system testing with defined entry and exit criteria
Nice to have
Experience with Delta Lake technologies including Delta Tables, Unity Catalog, Delta Live, Spark Structured Streaming, Photon, etc.
Exposure to DevOps/Deployment Automation/Continuous Delivery e.g. Azure DevOps, Octopus Deploy, Jenkins, PowerShell, ARM Templates, Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet, TeamCity, etc.
Test-driven development using common testing frameworks (e.g. pytest, nUnit, tSQLt, nBI, etc.)
Exposure to real-time integrations or IoT solutions e.g. Event Hubs, Service Bus, IoT and Event Grid in Azure; IoT Core, PubSub in Google Cloud; etc.
Knowledge of or exposure to MPP data storage including Azure Synapse, Google BigQuery, Snowflake, etc.
An understanding of software engineering principles including design patterns; proper use of version control; branching & merging; partially or fully automated release builds, continuous integration/delivery etc.
Background in delivering data-driven solutions for commercial real estate applications
Degree in IT, Engineering, natural sciences, business IT degree or in any quantitative discipline
Skills & Personal Qualities:
Excellent communication in English (verbal and written)
Curious, analytical mind, driven to solve sometimes complex problems
Committed, able to work to deadlines, prioritise and juggle between tasks.
Thoughtful, collaborative, and proactive ready to engage with stakeholders across the globe
High attention to detail and extremely organized, diligent, and focused
Able to communicate effectively at all levels, including the ability to negotiate and resolve conflict; build & maintain effective working relationships with internal and external personnel
Commitment to quality, strong sense of ownership and a thorough approach to work. 
Demonstrate flexibility and ability to deliver, good team player, also able to work independently
Ability to understand the mechanics and dependencies of complex technical systems and architectures.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Support the Solution and Data Architect(s) to design, build, deliver, and maintain the technical data infrastructure that is the foundation of the BI platform and support global data strategy initiatives
Provide technical leadership in data engineering good practice, drive the design patterns and practices that will achieve a scalable data integration platform that emphasizes re-usability and accelerates delivery with a focus on automation and continuous improvement
Assist the project delivery team to scope, plan and deliver new and enhanced data integrations
Use Azure Databricks for complex data cleansing, preparation, and analysis to meet the functional and non-functional needs of the business, and for re-usable data processing modules
Develop, test, and maintain Azure Data Factory pipelines and data flows to manage the extract, transform, and load of data from a variety of data sources to the data lake and data warehouse
Use T-SQL to build, maintain and enhance database objects (tables, views, procedures, etc.) in Azure SQL Database, helping to develop and enhance the Triana data warehouse as part of planned and ad-hoc development activities
Establish a mindset of innovation, constant improvement for best practices and business standards in data analytics and development, helping to turn raw data into actionable insights
Generate high-/low-level designs and technical specifications of existing and new data integration processes to the required business and technical standard
Support data science and other experimental initiatives by using the appropriate tool set including Databricks, ADF, Python and SQL to wrangle and prepare large and/or complex structured and semi-structured data, 
Work with Product Owners, Analysts and Account Teams to assist with data-related technical issues and propose suitable solutions, both short and long term
Provide leadership and support within the C&W BI Analyst Super User community in order to bring in best practices and innovation from other parts of the C&W organization.
Promote effective and consistent communication – both within your team and inter-department 
Work closely with a multi-disciplinary team in an Agile / Scrum environment ensuring quality deliverable end of each sprint. 
Kapcsolattartó / Information
International environment
Flexible (hibrid/remote) work structure and at the same time opportunity to work at a pleasant atmosphere in the new office of the company 
Attractive compensation package
Continuously expanding professional team
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur international client is looking for an experienced test automation engineer for their team based in Budapest. By joining the team, you'll be involved in the development and testing of one of their products, which optimizes the daily utilization of flights, increases user productivity and improves airline management when there are deviations from the regular schedule.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
3+ years of experience in test automation (or software development with a focus on QA)
Excellent English knowledge (spoken and written)
Knowledge of Java and JavaScript/TypeScript
Experience with browser-based automation tools
Experience in API testing
Familiarity with agile practises and CI/CD
Familiarity with version control (preferably Git) and issue tracking systems (preferably Jira)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience in SQL/NoSQL databases, cloud (preferably Azure or GCP), Linux/Unix
University degree in Computer Science
Amit kínálunk / OfferOur new test engineer's focus will be:
Creating automated tests on all levels of the testing pyramid
Working together with a cross-functional team to implement test development
Understanding and validating requirements from a testing perspective
Contributing creative ideas to help evolve our testing methodologies
Occasionally mentoring colleagues with less experience
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Flexible working hours, remote work opportunity
Training opportunities for professional and soft skills
Supportive, professional and multinational team
Discount on company flights
Agile (scrum) environment
Working part-time is also possible

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is the leading pet food and equipment store chain in Europe since 32 years. Their center is in Germany, but they are growing internationally and also on the Hungarian market, where they are setting up a business services center. They are looking for a talented colleague, who will support the German HQ and will participate in the digitalization of the store processes. Elvárások / Requirements
University degree (business administration or a comparable qualification)
5 years experience in retail sector (advantage is 2-3 years in the branch or field sales)
1,5 years experience as a Business Analyst or Project Manager
Interest in analyzing, optimizing and developing digital solutions
Fluent English
Willingness to travel to Germany couple times per year
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Analyzing and optimizing existing store processes within the company stores
Developing new digital solutions for store processes for the employees
Ensuring high-quality processes in the stores
Documenting and training of process flow
Planning and conception of all measures for cross-channel use cases that are necessary for the implementation of the process flows
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Flexible working hours
Hybrid working opportunity
Employee discount and Cafeteria
Dog friendly office
Open, transparent company culture
Training opportunities

Network Engineer állás Országos
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a well known technology company, with almost 2,000 employees worldwide, our client's Controls and Digitalization teams has a global presence. Their team focuses on providing value-added services and solutions to our customers in the areas of control, digitization, automation and electrical equipment. Elvárások / Requirements
Several years of professional experience of network OR IT security
Very good knowledge of LAN/WAN, TCP/IP, switching, routing, VPN and RF technologies as well as IT-Security concepts, standards, and hardening measures 
Knowledge in configuration of the hardware components related to switching/routing/firewall (Cisco, Ruggedcom, Checkpoint, Scalance switches and firewalls, etc.) 
Willingness for business trips (in total <30% per year) 
Fluent language skills in English
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Supporting our client's automation control system development and closely collaborating with the sales & bid manager
Configuration of switches/routers/firewalls under consideration of IT security requirements, commissioning of these as well as ensuring error-free functioning of the network during unit and system tests  
Preparation of technical specifications and documentation regarding communication and IT security in the projects 
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Opportunity to have an active engineering role on future handling complex projects with a high digitalization level
Working with an international teams and business environments
Excellent opportunity for professional development on a new tailored organization
Competitive benefit package (basic salary, bonus, daily allowance for travelling periods)

Senior Machine Learning Engineer állás Budapest
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is building a computational model of human cellular biology, transforming the understanding of deadly disease and designing life-saving treatments for patients with cancer.Combining molecular biology with data science, artificial intelligence and massive scale in the cloud, our interdisciplinary team works with leading biopharmaceutical companies across the globe.
They are a diverse team, driven by a shared thirst for understanding. Their data scientists, software engineers, molecular biologists and medical doctors are laser focused on unlocking complex cancer mechanisms and ways to precisely target them with efficient therapies.Elvárások / Requirements- At least 3 years industrial experience in the field of Machine Learning
- An advanced degree in computer science or equivalent experience
- The ability to implement ETL procedures combining multiple databases
- Knowledge of modern tools for ML such as Tensorflow 2, SageMaker, etc.
- Experience implementing machine learning workflows in the cloud
- An ability to work well in a research-heavy area with lot of unknowns
Nice to have:
- Experience building research prototypes for scientific investigation
- Experience with relevant research applying modern machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to biological data (e.g., genomics, transcriptomics, epigenomics, proteomics, etc.) or clinical data (e.g., electronic health records)
- Knowledge of the pharmaceutical industry, ideally with a focus on drug discoveryAmit kínálunk / Offer- Bring expertise in the application of artificial intelligence to real-world problems in drug discovery and development.
- Work as a member of a cross-functional team comprising specialists in AI, drug discovery and bioinformatics. In these teams, you will apply the latest advances in machine learning to develop tools for drug discovery and development.
- Implement reproducible workflows to investigate how can AI support us as we move deeper and deeper into sub-cellular mechanisms where there’s very little data.
- Build and optimize scalable machine learning systems to extract biological truth from noisy lab measurements using state-of-the-art machine learning. Finding of how the incorporation of those can enhance the firm's drug predictions.Kapcsolattartó / Information- innovative environment- team building events- carrier path- good career path- exiting projects- fast self-improvement- expanding team 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Projektmunkák
Önéletrajz feltöltés
Közösség
Kapcsolat
Törzskönyvező dokumentátor orosz nyelvtudással (pá... állás Budapest
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Megye: BudapestA pozíció leírása:Gyógyszeripari megbízó cégünkhöz keresünk törzskönyvezési dokumentátort napi 7 órás munkaidőbe orosz nyelvtudással (pályakezdőket is várunk)Feladatkör, felelősségek:• Új törzskönyvezéssel, törzskönyvi hosszabításokkal vagy törzskönyvi módosításokkal kapcsolatos analitikai dokumentumok összeállítása, fordítása.• Kutatás-fejlesztési területtel való aktív kapcsolattartásra törzskönyvezési oldalról• Új fejlesztésű készítmények törzskönyvi anyagának megírása orosz nyelven• Hatósági visszakérdezések megválaszolásA• Törzskönyvezési szabályok, guideline-k követése a napi munka során, és közös cél a precíz rendezett dokumentáció és visszakereshető tárolás.A munkakör betöltéséhez szükséges tapasztalat, végzettség:• Legalább középfokú aktív orosz nyelvismeret írásban• Természettudományos Ms.C. diploma (gyógyszerész, vegyészmérnök, biomérnök, környezetmérnök, vegyész)• Legalább 1-3 éves műszeres (HPLC, GC) analitikai gyakorlat• Pályakezdők jelentkezést is várjuk aktív középfokú orosz nyelvtudással és természettudományos diplomával.Előny:Angol nyelvtudásNyelvtudás:Aktív, mimimum középszintű orosz és magyar nyelvudásA megbízó cég profilja:Megbízónk Magyarország és Közép-Kelet-Európa egyik meghatározó gyógyszergyára, tevékenységük a gyógyszergyártás minden területére kiterjed a kutatás-fejlesztéstől a hatóanyag- és készgyógyszer-gyártáson át a kereskedelemig.Amit megbízónk kínál:• Versenyképes juttatási csomag (piacképes alapbér + 13. havi fizetés)• Cafeteria• Egészségügyi szolgáltatások ingyenes vagy kedvezményes igénybevétele• Céges nyaraló• Rugalmas munkavégzés (törzsidő 9:00-14:00 között )• Képzési és karrierlehetőségek• Vállalati bölcsőde és óvoda• Vállalati étkezde• Kamatmentes lakáshitel• Sportolási és szabadidős tevékenységek cégen belül ( teniszpálya, jóga, konditerem, stb.)• Csoportos élet- és balesetbiztosítás• Home office lehetőség (akár 100%)• Határozott idejű pozíció (kismama helyettesítése), hosszú távon lehetőség a határozatlan időreEgyéb:Jelentkezésével Ön hozzájárul az önéletrajzában szereplő adatok kezeléséhez, adatbázisba történő felvételéhez, ill. megfelelő állásajánlat esetén • előzetes egyeztetés alapján • megbízónknak való továbbításához. Amennyiben még nem tekintette meg, kérjük, olvassa el részletesen adatvédelmi tájékoztatónkat az alábbi linken: https://www.pbs-job.hu/?/data-protection/for-employees Jelentkezésével Ön tudomásul veszi az adatvédelemre vonatkozó tájékoztatást 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza
Tovább a hirdetőhöz

Kapcsolat
Pénzügyi vezető (kontrolling fókusszal) állás Budapest
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Megye: BudapestA pozíció leírása:SAP és Atlassian ökoszisztémákban szolgáltatásokat nyújtó nemzetközi IT tanácsadó cég részére keresünk pénzügyi vezetőt.Feladatkör, felelősségek:A pénzügyi vezető a Back Office nevű szervezetet vezeti, amely a szűken vett pénzügyi feladatokon túl számos támogató funkciót is ellát.Feladatok, felelősségek:• Megbízónknál a pénzügyi vezető feladata inkább az új beruházások és újszerű üzleti tevékenységek üzleti modelljeinek kidolgozása, nyomon követése, a kontrolling rendszer működtetése a fő feladata és kevésbé a munkatársak napi irányítása.• Ilyen feladatok lehetnek például: új iroda létesítésének optimális helyszín (ország/város) kiválasztása, helyi jogrendszernek megfelelő szerződések és üzleti modell kialakítása, adott országban optimális foglalkoztatási politika kialakítása, új helyszín beillesztése a cég pénzügyi és back office folyamataiba, de például új üzletág felállításához kapcsolódó üzleti tervezés és annak végrehajtása.• A Back Office szervezet többnyire önállóan dolgozó kollégáinak coacholása és koordinálása, a hatékonyság javításának folyamatos biztosítása tartozik a vezetői szerephez, illetve a jogszabályi megfelelés.• Ezen felül kiemelten fontos, hogy cégcsoport jogi- és szervezeti egységei között egy objektív mediátori szerepet töltsön be.Az új kolléga, ahogy a Back Office szervezet a csoport CEO-hoz tartozik közvetlenül és a management team tagja.Back Office szervezet tevékenységei:• A társaság pénzügyi folyamatainak működtetése• A számviteli feladatok és • rendszer hatékony működtetése• Kimenő számlák kezelése• Bejövő alvállalkozói és vegyes számlák kezelése• Pénztárforgalom kezelése• Utalások végrehajtása (szállítói számlák, fizetések, stb.)• Kintlévőség kezelése, lejárt számlák beszedésével kapcsolatos feladatok• Havi- és időszaki zárások végrehajtása, a kapcsolódó riportok elkészítése és a tulajdonosok felé az eredmények dokumentált riportolása• Terv / tény elemzések, ad-hoc riportok készítése• Projekt kontrolling a sales által megadott tervszámok és a tény könyvelési adatok összevetésével• Rövid-, közép- és hosszú távú pénzügyi tervek készítése• Cash-flow tervezés• Likvid eszközök kezelése, cash flow menedzsment• Kapcsolattartás a pénzintézetekkel• Adóhatósággal és más ellenőrző szervekkel való kapcsolattartás, ügyintézés, adatszolgáltatás.• Tulajdonosok és vezetők közti elszámolások objektív bonyolítása és ehhez kapcsolódó átlátható adatszolgáltatás• Ügyviteli rendszerhez (SAP) kapcsolódó változások menedzselése és ellenőrzése• HR adminisztrációs feladatok ellátása: bérszámfejtés, munkaszerződések kötése, • módosítása, • kezelése, szabadságok és betegállományok nyilvántartása és kezelése.• Belső céges rendezvények szervezése és lebonyolítása,• Saját flotta menedzselése flotta kezelő cégek segítségével,• Irodák üzemeltetése (Budapest, Debrecen, Ulm, Amsterdam),• IT rendszerek üzemeltetése és fejlesztése szolgáltatókon keresztül.A munkakör betöltéséhez szükséges tapasztalat, végzettség:• Tárgyalóképes angol nyelvtudás, német nyelvtudás előny• Nemzetközi cégnél szerzett tapasztalat• Jó kommunikációs és problémamegoldó készség, pontosság, megoldásorientált gondolkodásmód• SAP felhasználói ismeretekNyelvtudás:Tárgyalóképes angol nyelvtudás, német nyelvtudás előny.A megbízó cég profilja:Megbízónk SAP és Atlassian ökoszisztémákban szolgáltatásokat nyújtó nemzetközi IT tanácsadó cég.Amit megbízónk kínál:• Versenyképes juttatási csomag (Alapbér + bónusz + céges autó)• Bullshit mentes munkahelyi környezet és jó hangulat• Nemzetközi üzleti normák, szakmai fejlődési lehetőség• Home office munkavégzési lehetőség a feladatoktól függőenEgyéb:Jelentkezésével Ön hozzájárul az önéletrajzában szereplő adatok kezeléséhez, adatbázisba történő felvételéhez, ill. megfelelő állásajánlat esetén • előzetes egyeztetés alapján • megbízónknak való továbbításához. Amennyiben még nem tekintette meg, kérjük, olvassa el részletesen adatvédelmi tájékoztatónkat az alábbi linken: https://www.pbs-job.hu/?/data-protection/for-employees Jelentkezésével Ön tudomásul veszi az adatvédelemre vonatkozó tájékoztatást. 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Háziorvos állás Békés megye
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Megye: Békés megyeA pozíció leírása:Békés megyei, közel 8.000 fős település Önkormányzata háziorvosi körzetébe megfelelő háziorvost keres.Feladatkör, felelősségek:• Az orvos részére a közel 1300 kártyával rendelkező praxis ingyenesen átadásra kerül• A feladat vállalkozóként vagy közalkalmazotti jogviszonyban is ellátható• A település központi ügyelettel ellátott, az ügyeletben való részvétel saját döntés alapján lehetséges• Megbízási szerződéssel végezhető, plusz munkalehetőség a város telephelyén ellátott fogyatékos személyek orvosi ellátásaA munkakör betöltéséhez szükséges tapasztalat, végzettség:• Háziorvosi vagy szakorvosi végzettség• Végzettséget igazoló dokumentumok• Rezidensek, még alapképzésben résztvevők és• Határon túli szakemberek is pályázhatnakA megfelelő személyiségjegyek:• Erkölcsi hitelesség• Megbízhatóság és stabilitás• Empatikus személyiségA megbízó cég profilja:Megbízónk Békés megyei város helyi önkormányzata.Amit megbízónk kínál:• Kimagasló jövedelem• Megfelelően berendezett szolgálati lakás• Korszerűen felszerelt rendelő• A körzetben megfelelő végzettséggel és gyakorlattal rendelkező asszisztens segítsége• Rezidensek részére a tanulmányok végzéséhez anyagi támogatás biztosítása (tanulmányi szerződés kötése mellett)Egyéb:Jelentkezésével Ön hozzájárul az önéletrajzában szereplő adatok kezeléséhez, adatbázisba történő felvételéhez, ill. megfelelő állásajánlat esetén • előzetes egyeztetés alapján • megbízónknak való továbbításához.Amennyiben még nem tekintette meg, kérjük, olvassa el részletesen adatvédelmi tájékoztatónkat az alábbi linken:https://www.pbs-job.hu/?/data-protection/for-employeesJelentkezésével Ön tudomásul veszi az adatvédelemre vonatkozó tájékoztatást. 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Junior Accountant with Slavic languages állás Budapest
Egyéb IT pozik állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAre you looking for a job in Finance? Do you speak English, Hungarian and Russian or Ukrainian? Are you highly motivated and do you have a proactive approach? Then there is a great opportunity for you!
Our partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.Elvárások / Requirements
university degree in Economics
intermediate English knowledge, fluent Hungarian and Russian or Ukrainian language knowledge are mandatory
1-2 years of experience in a similar position is an advantage
ability to work with large amounts of information;
checking, editing, and printing primary documentation;
correspondence with counterparties in electronic form;
responsible attitude to work, accuracy, decency, and punctuality;
confident PC user, Word, and Excel.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
banking operations (creating payment orders, checking bank statements)
assisting the payroll team by the preparation of contracts with employees, signing documents by employees, transfer information to the chief accountant
controlling contracts and invoices from suppliers, systematizing documents, and managing folders and registers
collecting contracts and invoices for the chief accountant every month.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in the 13th district of Budapest (Agora)
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our friendly team
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Data Transmits Engineer állás Országos
Egyéb IT pozik állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.Elvárások / Requirements
Associates degree in computer science or a minimum of five years of work experience in Data Transmits.
Knowledge of file transfer protocols. i.e. SFTP, HTTPS, ConnectDirect, FTPS. (file transfer protocol – weboldal komuunikációs nyelve
Understanding of PGP encryption/signature and SSh/SSL keys and certificates.
Knowledge of FTP tools i.e. ProgressMOVEit, WS/FTP Pro, IBM Sterling File Gateway.
Knowledge of connectivity failures and troubleshooting methods for FTP issues.
Strong critical-thinking and problem-solving skills
Appropriate level of ITIL qualification.
Has a high level of interpersonal and communication skills and displays a self-driven, proactive work ethic.
Ability to work non-traditional work hours as needed.
Preferred Qualifications / Skills / Experience
Network Technical Center experience a Plus
Distributed Service Center experience a Plus
Amit kínálunk / OfferGTS File Transfer Services is a Level 3 team which provides Data Transmits Services infrastructure support to meet the needs of the diverse range of customers across the globe. Responsible for the provision and maintenance of several different Data Transmits methods and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service providers.
The team will provide & manage a shared Data Transmits service with associated satellite sites as required to AEGON / Transamerica entities, by utilising global staff capabilities across multiple sites.
The role of a Data Transmits engineer is to make sure the Data Transmits services are available 24/7/365 to support the services the business units require. Monitoring & working with 3rd parties to protect the Data Transmits services on a resilient base to minimise all risks to the service. Managing / overseeing all Data Transmits services from the satellite sites. Fully responsible for all Data Transmits services, escorting 3rd parties when required ensuring the key SOX audit controls are met & documented.
Key Duties, Accountability and Responsibilities:
Ability to track and patch all Data Transmits installs within the environment to documented standards.
Ability to perform upgrades and maintenance.
Provide frontline support for file transfer related calls, incidents, and service requests.
Ensure all team tickets are resolved within our agreed SLA’s. (service level agreement)
Maintain quality assurance of documentation and standards of installs/Decommissions etc.
Ability to manage all installs that are performed by 3rd
Ability to plan/design/oversee implementation of all aspects of Data Transmit systems with limited assistance.
Work with customers to identify Data Transmits requirements.
Work in partnership with 3rd parties to make sure the infrastructure that supports the Data Transmits service is fit for purpose.
Work with 3rd party providers to complete work in satellite locations.
Participate successfully on a project team with limited assistance.
Able to act as a point of contact for disaster recovery for all aspects of Data Transmits systems.
Support on-call 24x7.
Kapcsolattartó / Information 
Home office
Competitive salary
Flexible working hours
Very good development opportunities in a global company
Highly people-centric environment
Diverse and interesting tasks and projects
Health Insurance
Training & Development opportunities
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentWho is our partner?
Our partner's mission is to provide a tool that makes urban commuting more convenient and contributes to building a sustainable future. Their main product is a mobile application for parking and electric vehicle charging. Furthermore they work closely with big corporations, providing software and hardware related to parking and charging. 
Right now they are looking for their new Software Test Engineer colleague.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
Completed technical education in the field of IT or engineering
At least 3-5 years of experience in software testing
Familiarity with SQL
Reliable English knowledge
Soft skills we are looking for:
Analytical thinking
Proactivity, good communication skills
Ability to work well as part of a team
It is a PLUS if you have:
ISTQB
Some programming knowledge (preferably in Java or JavaScript)
Familiarity with some testing tools and methodologies (Postman / SoapUI /Selenium / Appium / JMeter)
Experience with an issue tracking system (Jira / Redmine / Testlink / Spira)
User level familiarity with Linux
Amit kínálunk / OfferThe following challenges await the Software Test Engineer:
Designing test scripts and test cases based on given specifications
Conducting functional and user tests
Error analysis, defect tracking and documentation
Taking part in the development and implementaton of new testing methods and principles
Working closely with the software engineer and sales teams
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers you:
Partial home office opportunity
Competitive renumeration package with stock options and education support
Diverse tasks using modern technologies
A friendly team of young professionals
A chance to join a growing project in an emerging industry

Cégleírás / Organisation / Department
Our international client is looking for an experienced test automation engineer for their team based in Budapest. By joining the team, you'll be involved in the development and testing of one of their products, which optimizes the daily utilization of flights, increases user productivity and improves airline management when there are deviations from the regular schedule.
Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
At least 3 years of experience in software development or test automation
Experience in Java and/or C#
Active English and Hungarian language skills (spoken and written)
Experience in CI/CD
Extensive knowledge of automation tools and software testing processes
Understanding of software development processes and methodologies (especially Agile and Scrum)
It's an advantage if you also have:
Familiarity with some of the following technologies: SQL/NoSQL databases, Git, Selenium, Azure, Linux/Unix
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science
Experience with containerized applications (Docker, Kubernetes)
Cloud experience
Amit kínálunk / OfferOur new test engineer's focus will be:
Participating in implementation projects in a cross-functional team
Implementing test scenarios from component level to system tests including non-functional ones
Proactively improving the QA strategy
Engaging in all of the steps of the development lifecycle as a tester
Validating requirement / user stories from testing perspective
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers:
Flexible working hours, remote work opportunity
Training opportunities for professional and soft skills
Supportive, professional and multinational team
Discount on company flights
Agile (scrum) environment

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
We are looking for proactive, fresh grad QA engineer for the following position:
JUNIOR MANUAL QA ENGINEERElvárások / RequirementsRequirements you should fulfill:
Experience in Web/Mobile/Desktop application testing 
Knowledge of testing methods and technologies, understanding of formal software development processes (SDLC)
Experience in building testing strategies for various projects and evaluating test coverage
Experience in working with bug-tracking systems, and version control systems
Understanding of client-server architecture
API testing experience
SQL basics
At least intermediate-level English skills
Ability to switch quickly between tasks
Flexible analytical and algorithmic thinking, desire for self-development, persistence in finding solutions, and achieving goals
It is a huge PLUS if you have experience with the following:
Higher education in IT or a related field
Basic programming or scripting skills
Automation experience in Java, Python, or another language
Experience with building servers to ensure continuous integration
Experience in performance testing
Use of traffic analyzers (Fiddler, WireShark, or others)
Amit kínálunk / OfferWhat you will do in the first three months:
Participate in the analysis of the application’s business logic and cover it with tests
Come up with an individual development plan together with your lead and improve your skills based on it
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat can our Partner offer?
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided for you to be able to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our client's friendly team

Service Operations /Change Management Analyst állás Országos
IT management állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, UK and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil and Iberia and an Asset Management organization with locations in UK, US, NL and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, we foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. We are a people business, and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.
The Intermediate Service Management Analyst is responsible for supporting the delivery of critical services for each team that comprises Production Support. Service Management practices include Problem Management; Knowledge Management, Incident Management, Change Enablement, Capacity, Availability and Performance Management and Service Introduction.Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related degree or equivalent work experience and minimum of 2-4 years technical enterprise work experience.
Experience in change management in multinational environment
Excellent time management skills including the ability to juggle multiple priorities simultaneously.
Strong decision making and problem-solving skills.
Ability to stay committed to the task even during times of frequent change or information delays.
Comfortable working with multiple teams.
Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Accurate and precise attention to detail.
Able to build strong interpersonal relationships with teammates, leadership, senior management, and internal and external stakeholders.
Proficient computer skills, Microsoft Office Suite; working knowledge of software development.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Understands and follows standards, policies, and procedures.
Knows fundamental process management based on ITIL and business analysis skill set. 
Design and develop user training and job aids
Develops testing plans to confirm processes are in alignment with operational requirements
Seeks to understand impact of actions on others (team, GTS, other business unit customers)
Communicates in a way that demonstrates appropriate timing, audience, content, and method
Works to identify optimal solutions or root cause of issues
Competency in gathering, analyzing, classifying, and documenting requirements
Possesses and applies comprehensive knowledge of Enterprise process and procedure issues.
Participates successfully on a project team with minimal assistance.
Works from established procedures with limited instructions
Performs varied work, requiring some originality
Makes recommendations for changes to procedures
Effectively applies fundamental concepts of function
Working knowledge of project management concepts, able to manage subsets of project tasks
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
 A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is an e-commerce company that is looking for a dynamic, agile CTO to manage technological changes, design new solutions with the education of the team and building the necessary resources and competencies.Elvárások / RequirementsExperience:- 10+ years of experience in managerial roles- 5+ years of experience as a software developerQualifications & certification:- BA/MA in computer science or equivalentSkills & Competencies:- Dynamic, agile work style- Number driven analytical skills with strong desire to measure everything- Straightforward, direct communication style- Solid software development background including Java & JavaScript knowledgeAmit kínálunk / Offer- Responsible for the company’s IT development strategy, able to design and deliver- Translate IT solutions into business language in a simple straightforward way- Research and measure the business effectiveness of all IT solutions, monitor continuously the success- Adapt fast and in an agile way to changes, able to redesign- Hands on technological support for the team with continuous coaching- Point of contact for external IT partners making sure equally on fluent collaboration and best agreements for the company- Daily communication with internal stakeholders to prioritize, align goals and solutionsKapcsolattartó / Information- Competitive base salary- Company car- Yearly bonus- Home office- Opportunity to influence the technological future of a market leader company

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for a Vulnerability Reporting Analyst.Elvárások / Requirements
3+ years in vulnerability management or information security reporting functions
Strong communication skills.
Excellent attention to detail.
Familiarity with:
Vulnerability Assessment tools, e.g., Nessus, Qualys, etc.
OS Security, e.g., Unix, Linux, Windows, Cisco, etc.
Web application infrastructure, e.g., Application Servers, Web Servers, Databases
Web development and programming languages i.e., Python, Perl, Ruby, Java, and/or .Net
Business Intelligence tools
SQL scripting and advanced Excel skills
Strong work ethic and a proactive mindset with ability to think “outside of the box” to solve problems.
Experience solving complex data flow challenges.
Advanced knowledge of complex queries for data analysis.
Experience with at least one coding language (PowerShell, Python, C#, etc.).
Experience in automation and optimization of repetitive processes and reporting.
Education:
Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Maintain oversight of all infrastructure hygiene, vulnerability reporting, and GEM reporting.
Work with vulnerability lifecycle managers, operations and application support teams, and the vulnerability data team to analyze requirements, design and develop specs and manage data which supplies information to all vulnerability threat reporting and analysis.
Create ad-hoc reports for additional management or audit related requests.
Work with partnering organizations to automate manual metrics and reporting.
Support the GEM Operations Lead with ad-hoc requests.

Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

Information Security Program Analyst állás Budapest
Rendszer / Hálózat, DevOps állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is one of the leading investment banks in the world, and for their growing professional team we are looking for an Information Security Program Analyst.Elvárások / Requirements
3+ years of experience in information security or related technology experience
Experience working in an information security team defining, revising and implementingcorporate information security policies
Experience analyzing security assessments and creating metrics visualizations for analytics
Experience reviewing application security testing results from various testing tools
Project Management experience a plus
Experience with governance and implementation of security policies, standards, procedures,programs, plans and processes
Experience coordinating initiatives related to process control design and testing
Professional Certifications in Information Security domain a plus
Demonstrate an aptitude to develop and implement application security strategies and plansbased on company standards
Familiarity with security standards such as OWASP, NIST, PCI DSS, etc.
Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication
Proven analytical, influencing and relationship management skills
Education:
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Governance of Application System Testing standards and policies - review the standards andmake enhancements based on application assets
Identify compliance objectives and map program deliverables to the requirements
Document scope of assets to be included in the system security testing standard forvulnerability assessments
Collaborate with business and enterprise architecture team to implement changes required toidentify assets for vulnerability assessments scoping
Document business requirements related to system enhancements and submit for reviewsand approvals
Map out process flows for controls in systems and review for improvements to make controlsmore effective
Monitor vulnerability assessment exemption and exception requests and process based ondocumented system testing standards and policies
Collect information for generating and communicating responses for internal audit questions and deliverables promptly
Design and implement a solution for performance measurements on effectiveness of controlsand overall vulnerability assessment program
Analyze trends on assets security health posture and report using visualization tools forprogram review with management and stakeholders
Provide timely, accurate, and actionable reporting on application vulnerability activity, trends,service levels, and areas of concern to senior management
Document and standardize business rules for accurate compliance measurements andtracking metrics based on application security testing standard
Work with the Metrics reporting team to enhance and refine the metrics and keyperformance indicators reported to senior management and external regulatory agencies
Develop User acceptance test plans for testing changes to system enhancements that impactgovernance and compliance
Serve as a Program SME and drive open issues to a closure with appropriate resolution
Update power point presentations monthly and quarterly for application security programreviews
Train and mentor team members as needed
Weekly and Monthly Status reporting for the program
Kapcsolattartó / InformationCompetitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance
Flexible work arrangements
Continuous career progression opportunities across geographies and business line
An inclusive and friendly corporate culture with diverse networking opportunities

Senior Red Team Operations & Penetration Testing A... állás Budapest
Tesztelés állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon is a multinational financial services group headquartered in The Hague, the Netherlands. The company has multiple locations across the globe, with core markets in The Netherlands, UK and the US, growth markets in China, Brazil and Iberia and an Asset Management organization with locations in UK, US, NL and Hungary. Aegon Global Business Solution Center is supporting these businesses with IT, Finance, Risk, Model Validation, Actuarial, Audit and Asset management services with a growing team of approx. 300 people, based in Budapest, Hungary.
At Aegon, we foster a diverse workforce and an inclusive culture. We are a people business, and we recognize that delivering excellent client outcomes comes from harnessing distinct perspectives. We value diversity in the full range of human uniqueness without limitation, including race, gender, ability, language, culture, beliefs, age, origin, background, perspectives, and experiences.Elvárások / Requirements
Do No Harm approach: operational objectives cannot come at the expense of others
Growth Mindset. Excited for opportunities to solve new problems every day
Helpful demeanor. We are trusted adversaries and that trust needs to remain strong
Customization of Adversarial Tools: Cobalt Strike BOFs, Mythic Agent profiles, and adding new exploits to MSF are examples
Defender experience and knowledge. Utilizing Splunk and finding risks
Web application penetration testing assessments
Email, phone, or physical social-engineering assessments
Developing, extending, or modifying exploits, shell code or exploit tools
Network penetration testing and manipulation of network infrastructure
Relevant, recent and verifiable experience in information security and adversary simulation
Detailed knowledge of global cyber threats, threat actors, and the tactics, techniques and procedures used by cyber adversaries, specifically those targeting the financial services sector
Experience with Red, Blue, or Purple teaming exercises
Industry certifications such as OSCP, OSCE, OSWE, GPEN, GCIH, GWAPT, or GXPN
Five + years cyber security engineering experience
Ability to define and communicate complex technical risk problems, concepts and situations to multiple skill levels; including business personnel with little to no cyber experience
Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Preference given to candidates with deep Excel and PowerPoint skill sets
Experience with systems such as Service Now, JIRA, and equivalent
Ability to fluently read, write and speak English
Experience with leading group discussion and presenting to varying levels and audiences
Self-motivated and self-management skills
Preferred Skills, Education and Certifications:
Strong knowledge of Penetration Testing and covert Red Team operations and Information Security demonstrated by one or more of the following:
Bachelor degree in Information/Cyber Security, Information Risk, Information Risk Management or equivalent experience
Bachelor degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Management or similar four year technical degree or equivalent experience, combined with one or more of the following:
Active Cyber Security certifications
Experience in Insurance, Payments, Banking or other Fin-Tech Industries
Strong preference for candidate with excellent Excel and PowerPoint skills
Amit kínálunk / OfferThis dynamic role requires broad understanding of red team operations and penetration testing principles to support Aegon’s Security program.
As a part of the Red Team team within the global SOC, you will be a part of the Security Operations team responsible for unannounced red team operations and managing penetration tests. The Red Team conducts advanced adversary emulation operations to challenge assumptions and emulate cyber and criminal threat actors targeting or attacking the business.
As a Red Team member, you will participate in the design and execution of campaign-based security operations for Aegon, spanning a varying array of targets. Successful team members must be capable of evaluating environments, applications, systems or processes to discover weaknesses, and subsequently leverage those discoveries into actionable real-world attack strategies.
To succeed in this role the candidate will possess breadth and depth of knowledge in security of operating systems, networking and protocols, firewalls, databases and middleware applications, forensics, scripting and programing. Red team members are expected to continuously improve theirtradecraft through research, to add breadth and depth to their knowledge.
What You Will Do: 
Find new and creative ways to break technology through either Red Team or Purple Team operations
Plan, scope, and implement large scale covert operations that have sophisticated goals and significant impact
Develop new adversary tools, techniques, or methodologies
Threat Hunting opportunities to partner with the teams Threat Hunters, using our special adversarial talents to discover and eradicate threats
Engagement in all phases of Red Team security operations
Work within the Red Team to perform physical exploitation, network exploitation and social engineering assessments against authorized targets
Perform network reconnaissance and open source intelligence gathering
Configure and safely utilize attack tools, tactics, and procedures against authorized targets
Develop scripts, tools, or methodologies to enhance red teaming capabilities
Effectively communicate findings and strategy to client stakeholders including technical staff, executive leadership, and legal counsel
Provide risk-appropriate and pragmatic recommendations to correct identified flaws, vulnerabilities and misconfigurations
Lead projects in mid to high level complexity
Mentor other more junior members of the team
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Competitive salary
Comprehensive health package
Brand new office at an excellent location
Hybrid working
Opportunities for growth and advancement
A highly people centric, positive and supportive work environment
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.
We are looking for proactive, fresh grad developers for the following position:
JUNIOR .NET DEVELOPERElvárások / RequirementsRequirements you should fulfill:
0.5-1 year of work experience in the IT sphere
Excellent knowledge of OOP and the basics of the .NET platform (.Net Framework and.Net Core)
Confident knowledge of the C# syntax
Experience with .NET Core, ASP.NET Core, CSS, HTML, JavaScript
Good knowledge of SQL and MS SQL database, ability to use EntityFramework effectively
Good technical English (conversational, written)
It is a huge PLUS if you have experience with the following:
WCF, WPF
Angular, React
Unit testing (TDD, BDD)
Amit kínálunk / OfferWhat you will do in the first three months:
Follow an individual development plan with your supervisor and improve your skills based on that
Participate in writing the application’s business logic and covering it with tests
Expand the rich user interface and offer ideas for improving it
Develop data schemas and integrate with third-party services
Optimize heavily loaded parts of the application and deal with security vulnerabilities
Become a member of a team of professionals to achieve quality results efficiently.
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat can our Partner offer?
Stable long-term work environment
Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions
Benefits and social packages
Comfortable A+ office in Budapest
Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided for you to be able to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste
Paid English courses and conversation clubs
Opportunities for professional and personal growth
Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs
Support and care from our client's friendly team

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is one of the leading global automotive suppliers. As an internationally positioned IT team, they support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, they count more than 6,000 users among their internal customers.They operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management, and their PLM system CIM Database.To strengthen their team they are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal and professional growth.Elvárások / Requirements
University degree in a business or technical field (or comparable qualification/experiences)
Minimum of four years of professional business and technical experience within the Users & Authorisations area of SAP R/3 system with an international background. 
Experience in the SAP system landscape, preferably ERP, HR, SAC, S/4HANA, Fiori, and Solution Manager.
Good knowledge of SAP products administration and their integration with other software systems
S/4 HANA knowledge would be an advantage
Fluency in in English
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Definition of role concepts and creation of roles for all critical applications (such as SAP, ERP, HR, SAC, S/4HANA, Fiori, BW and Solution Manager);
Quality control and continuous improvement of the processes;
Regular reporting to the service/application owner;
Handover and training of the roles to the service desk, as well as monitoring of the service;
Performance of user administration activities for user IDs and roles in SAP and other application systems in scope;
Assure those access authorizations respect the Corporate Governance procedures;
Ensuring the availability of the necessary documentation of user access requests and their approvals and corresponding processing of these requests;
Support of IT projects, providing the necessary user administration activities during all project phases. Ensure a smooth transition into operations;
Providing support for the Internal and External Audit
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Professional development opportunities
Competitive salary
Dynamic atmosphere
Remote working

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is one of the leading global automotive suppliers. As an internationally positioned IT team, they support the Client's product development by providing applications and solutions for mechanical and software development and for the management of development data. In this processes, they count more than 6,000 users among their internal customers.They operate in a very heterogeneous environment of applications, such as CATIA Mechanical Design, MS Project Server, JIRA, GIT Software Management, Doors NG Requirements Management, and their PLM system CIM Database.To strengthen their team they are looking for a qualified and motivated IT specialist at our location in Budapest.We offer an exciting work environment in a globally operating enterprise with many various opportunities for your own personal and professional growth.Elvárások / Requirements
Deep knowledge of MS-Sharepoint, at least 3 years of experience
Experience in creating Nintext workflows
General IT infrastructure knowledge
Interface and REST-API knowledge
Scripting Language Knowledge such as PowerShell, JavaScript, Visual Basic
Experience in dealing with web technologies
Good English skills (spoken and written)
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Fluency in English
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our solution architects
Sharepoint development of add-on and Nintex-workflows according to the requirements of our business partners
Business Support in creating Sharepoint project rooms or communities according to the company's best practices
Evaluation and integration of new tools into the SharePoint collaboration tool environment 
User support, incident handling, and standard service fulfillment for the tool landscape 
Testing and documentation
Service owner for one or more collaboration applications possible
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Professional development opportunities
Competitive salary

Project Manager - Project Data Structure & Process... állás Országos
IT management állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. They allow vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, the company offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.Elvárások / Requirements● Academic degree (min. M.Sc.) in Business / Industrial Engineering or (Business) Informatics● Min. 3 years of professional experience in (IT) Consultancy, Project or Process Management, or similar field● Excellent analytical skills, complex task / problem solving and management competences● Expertise in data structures, intelligent data management, digitalization, digital solutions and tools● Experiences in acting as IT product owner, IT product manager, and / or IT project manager● Reliable and structured way of working ensuring highest accuracy of working results● Ability to effectively cooperate & communicate with Top Management● Acknowledged competence to successfully drive interdisciplinary collaboration● Relevant experience in managing complex, multi-interface, cross-hierarchy, teams / networks● Team player, high motivation, personal drive, and self-organization talent● Knowledge of typical project outlines, project mgmt. requirements and project setupsAmit kínálunk / Offer● Represents domain Program Management in Divisional cross-sectional digitalization initiatives● Leads international, cross-sectional digitalization projects, and corresponding reporting to Top Management● Develops Project Management digitalization concepts in line with Divisional and Domain strategy● Drives cross-sectional association of data with projects, incl. data structure, keys, sources, and transfer● Defines data management processes to establish and sustainably anchorproject-oriented data structures● Oversees global roll-out for digital concepts including training, support, tracking adherence, compliance● Ensures global governance for Program Management related digitalization activities, tools, and processes● Acts as product manager for Project Management data management solutions, i.a. domain data expert, product owner in IT projects, and administrator of Project Management systems, infrastructure, and tools● Leads continuous improvement process and drives further development / digitalization roadmapKapcsolattartó / Information● Stable company background and long-term working possibility● Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company● Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries● Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses● Competitive salary and performance-related bonus● Cafeteria with optional elements● School start support 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
