Backend Engineer (Scala) - protect team állás Budapest
Docker
AWS
Scala
Apache
remote
Back-end fejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAt our Client they are on a mission to modernize voice with trust, identity, and intelligence. They are protecting everyday people from spam and fraud calls, connecting businesses with their customers, and helping carriers secure their networks for all. In 2015, the Company founder saw the increasing need for innovation in the voice channel and began building the first caller ID and spam blocking apps for mobile while at Whitepages. In early 2016, the Company spun out of Whitepages and brought its technology to market through Samsung Smart Call, the first-ever network-based spam solution with AT&T, and the our Client's consumer app. Three years later in 2019, they brought our Client connect to market, a B2B branded call service that enables enterprise companies to connect to the consumers they are trying to reach. The combination of Protect, Connect, and the app has resulted in the world's largest Voice Performance Platform with over 200M monthly active users.Elvárások / RequirementsExperience or interest in functional programming in a typed setting; 
A philosophy of iteration and continuous improvement;
Experience building highly scalable and -available production services;
BSc or M.S in a relevant field; 2+ years relevant work experience;
Excellent communication and self-organization skills incl. working within and with other remote teams;
Familiar with data storage- and processing systems (such as Postresql, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Redshift, Apache Spark, ElasticSearch, Redis);
Experience with *nix.
Proficient at collaborating and communicating with both local and remote team members in English and Hungarian
You will have a fast start if you have experience with:
Scala
Cloud environments (AWS)
Big-data technologies and platforms (Spark, Athena/Presto, Zeppelin, Databricks)
Modern deployment environments (Kubernetes, Docker)
High performance HTTP APIAmit kínálunk / OfferAbout the Position
The Backend Engineer is an Individual contributor position responsible for designing, coding and operating high performance data processing systems and backend services for their customer facing web services on the JVM platform (primarily Scala). Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand their entire stack, from their cloud platform (AWS) through data storage technologies (such as DynamoDB, Redshift) and stream processing (Kafka) all the way to Scala/akka based services.
About the Team
Our Client's Protect team has built a leading fraud detection system for phone calls used by millions of users around the Globe through mobile and network integrations. Their mission is to eliminate unwanted calls and bring trust and intelligence back to the phone calls by using modern technologies and machine learning. Their innovative platform is able to process hundreds of thousands requests and runs half million models per second.
What You’ll Do
Work at a supportive and fast-growing startup with a fantastic team.
Build and operate world class services in the field of phone fraud detection
Make an impact in the lives of tens of millions of consumers on a daily basis
Collaborate and learn from other great team members.
Support in developing your skills and accelerating your careerKapcsolattartó / InformationPrivate Retirement/Pension program 
Medicover
Commuter benefit, parking facility, bike storage
Donation Matching for a charity of your choice (up to $500/ year)
WFH equipment stipend 
$1,000/year in Professional Development funds
Online English Classes
Gym membership
Full-flex working model (You decide whether you are working from home or from the office.) 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.Elvárások / RequirementsProfound education in Computer Science, Information Technology or Information Systems (Master, Bachelor or comparable) or equivalent working experience
3+ years experience in Java development and enterprise solution design / implementation
3+ years experience with relational database systems
Experience designing and developing integrated enterprise applications
Experience with source control management systems
Experience with multi-threading and concurrency
Experience with debugging, performance profiling and optimization
Excellent understanding of object-oriented and service-oriented application development concepts
Fluent English in spoken and written
Personality:
Sociable personality and communication skills
Highly developed analytical skills and systematic way of working
Independent and proactive way of working
Result oriented and practical thinking
Willingness to constantly educate oneself
Interested in working in a multicultural environment and teamAmit kínálunk / OfferParticipate in an international team rolling out global solutions for industrial business
Responsible for software architecture and design based on business requirements
Responsible for implementation and development of business applications
Responsible for reliability and quality of implemented application
Strong collaboration with product owner and development team
Design and develop new features based Java SDK
Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship
Responsible for continuous development of the development guidelines and documentation
Contribution to continuous improvement of development methodology and processesKapcsolattartó / InformationA modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
They support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60% of the working time in many of their positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
They organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. We are looking for a Lead developer to be part of their team. Elvárások / RequirementsSuccessfully completed studies in the field of (business) computer science, business (engineering) or a comparable subject;Very experienced in developing IT architectures;Several years of professional experience in the field of software development / full stack, cloud, microservices and knowledge of infrastructure and operationsSystematic application of methods for requirements analysis and agile software development (Scrum, Kanban, UX) as well as systematic application of standards in IT service management (IT-PEP, ITIL, DevOps);Technology stack: extensive knowledge of Java and JavaScript, Docker, MS Azure and databases including graph databases;Fluency in written and spoken EnglishAmit kínálunk / OfferYour Tasks will be:
Responsibility for the architecture and interface design, requirements analysis and subsequent implementation for an end-to-end IoT cloud;Responsibility for conceptual tasks in backend development with high demands on data security and data protection;Proactive source of ideas for new technologies, systems, processes and optimizations;Analysis, conception, implementation and testing of new customer-specific applications and modules.Support for the requirements survey, presentation of the results to the customer and technical and technological advice;Coaching and technical management of 10 developers in the team;The applications that you are responsible for implementing are based on Java, JavaScript, Python and Go. Other programming languages can also be integrated. The deployment infrastructure is in the cloud.Kapcsolattartó / InformationStable company background and long-term working possibility;Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company;Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries;Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses;Competitive salary and performance-related bonus;Cafeteria with optional elements;Home office work;School start support

DevOps Engineer in Platform Engineering állás Budapest
Mysql
Docker
GCP
Linux
SQL
AWS
remote
IT / Dev architect  állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsEducated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in Ops/DevOps or software development
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
Skills that drive success in this role:
Unix/Linux/Bash, setting up and managing virtual servers. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what we do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
Clean coding skills. We are always expanding the areas where we apply the “infrastructure as code” approach. We write new code and we carefully review the code of our colleagues, ranging from small infrastructure automation scripts, continuous integration support, to more complex backend code.
Kubernetes, Helm. We continue migrating more of our services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
SQL, MySQL. We manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. We use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. We aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and we rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but we don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role:
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
JUnit/TestNG
GitOps, CDK, EKS, Flux
CI/CD pipelines, JenkinsAmit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend their AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of their platform and participate in their journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of infrastructure Ops, DevOps, and full-stack Software Engineering.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole worldKapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement

Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsSkills that drive success in this role
Java, clean coding skills. Some of our most impactful changes are done on the software backend side of the services that we run and we use Java even for the automation of our platform itself.
Spring Boot. We provide standardised service setup to other dev teams and this industry standard framework is an integral part of it.
Unix/Linux/Bash. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what they do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
SQL, MySQL. They manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Kubernetes, Helm. They continue migrating more of their services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. They use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. They aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and they rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but they don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role
JUnit/TestNG
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Git
GitOps (Flux)
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
Further requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in software development or Ops/DevOps
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
 Amit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend our AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of our platform and participate in our journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of backend Software Engineering and infrastructure Ops/DevOps.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the Flexion platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
 Kapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.Elvárások / RequirementsEducation in Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Technology or Information Systems (bachelor, high school or comparable experience)
2+ years experience in one or more object-oriented languages (Javascript, Typescript, Python, Java, etc.)
Experience with git version control, CI/CD Pipelines with GitHub or Azure DevOps
Knowledge and experience about database design
Experience in cloud environments is a plus (Microsoft Azure, AWS, functions as a service, Docker, …)
Fluent English in spoken and written
Personality:
Think and act in the sense of the enterprise, analytical intellectual power
Make decisions in his/her field of activity, be an organizational talent
Efficient, independent and team oriented form of work
Good communication and problem solving skills
Integrated personality and organizational skillsAmit kínálunk / OfferImplement ETL and streaming processes to bring local production and other data to their Cloud Platform using Azure Functions, Azure Data Factory, machine learning and analytic services
Leverage the insights to their data using data analytics tools, image pattern recognition and other data processing functions
Working together in an international team with web application developers, data engineers and DevOps engineersKapcsolattartó / InformationA modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
They support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60 % of the working time in many of their positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
They organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

Our client electrifies a wide range of vehicle types. With its products, the company contributes to reducing emissions, protecting the climate and enhancing safe mobility.
The new colleague will work in normal office hours (no shifts), and a very flexible HO policy is available with multiple options.

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.Elvárások / RequirementsWhat You Will Need:Qualifications;Four-year Computer Science or related degree, or equivalent work experience;3 or more years of experience including 2 years of experience in supporting enterprise-level platform installations;3 years of experience working with cloud providers (Azure/ AWS, etc..);At least 2 years of experience with Agile development and planning methodologies;2-3 years of experience working in a high performing DevOps team or role;2-3 years of experience in performance monitoring, alerting and troubleshooting in an enterprise;Strong, holistic understanding of the internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layerPreferred:Experience working in roles with a strong focus on security, including automated alerting and response;Demonstrate a strong understanding of API’s and API Security;Demonstrated ability in automated code testing;Certifications in relevant technologies, methods, or platforms;Demonstrate the key critical behaviors of commitment to task, communication, customer focus, decision;Making/problem solving, tolerance of ambiguity, planning, prioritizing, and goal settingAmit kínálunk / OfferWhat You Will Do:Develop, Deploy and Support Cloud Infrastructure, as code artifacts or modules;Design, Build and Maintain Cloud infrastructure and applications;Support and deliver using Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines;Design and Support resiliency and scalability using AWS and other cloud platforms;Enable systems with automated monitoring and alerting;Support the Team and Customers with day-to-day requests, Change and Incident tickets;Support Technology stack refresh on Systems (end-to-end) when required;Ensure automated security is built into each technology stackKapcsolattartó / InformationVery good development opportunities in a global company;Workplace in a pleasant atmosphere with motivated and team-oriented colleagues;Diverse and interesting tasks and projects;Competitive salary

Mérnöki / Ipari programozás állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentIf you are interested in IT security, the challenges of digitalization, and care about consistent user interfaces: we are looking forward to your application! Our Client for more than 20 years has been the preferred strategic partner for demanding security solutions of renowned customers in the area of banking, insurance, and government. They offer a solution-oriented and uncomplicated corporate culture with flexible working hours, plenty of room for initiative, development opportunities, and attractive employment conditions in a forward-looking and dynamic company. The Company's product portfolio is being further developed and adapted to new technology trends to meet the constantly evolving requirements of digitalization. That's why we're looking for you.Elvárások / Requirements2+ years professional experience with cloud-native development
Strong Cloud Provider and/or Kubernetes/Docker expertise
You are a “Clean Code evangelist” and have experience in developing Java applications with Spring Boot
Proven track record using Terraform, Ansible, or similar to automate infrastructure in production settings
“12-factor” principles is a plus
A university degree (MSc/BSc) in Computer Science or a related field - or similar
 Amit kínálunk / OfferLeverage cutting edge technologies like Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker to design and build new Identity and Access Management products for the Cloud
Take end-to-end responsibility for your engineered results and automate everything to scale their Cloud service
Work on all layers (infrastructure as code, automation monitoring) using open source components and open standards
Integrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectures
Do on the job training's
Mentor junior colleagues (do code reviews, give support in technical design, etc.)
Use Scrum, TDD and modern software development methodologiesKapcsolattartó / InformationAnnual bonus
Company mobile phone (iPhone/Android)
Company laptop (Lenovo/Apple)
Private health insurance (Medicover White package)
Self-development support with sponsored trainings
Flexible working hours
Opportunity to work from home
Half-day vacation for 24th of December and 31st of December
International environment with a small friendly team
Modern working environment (new office, Xbox, csocsó etc.)
Private nursery and kindergarten support 
Fresh fruits and veggies every day
24/7 Employee Assistance Program (psychological and well being support, advices on finance and legal topics)
Other local benefits aligned with the global Company Guidelines 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services. As a DevOps Engineer, you’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.Elvárások / RequirementsExperience in administering Linux/UNIX and Windows systems (must be practical, at least two years);Experience with web servers and deployment of web applications;Experience with AWS cloud systems;Experience with Docker and Kubernetes;Experience with MongoDB, MySQL;Practical CI/CD automation and organization skills (Jenkins, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, CodePipeline);Knowledge of bash/shell;Ansible automation experience is desirable;Knowledge of Python is desirable;Knowledge of English at the intermediate level is required Amit kínálunk / OfferYour responsibilities will be: 
Deploying and configuring microservices applications on AWS;CI/CD process development and support;Support and administration of infrastructures on AWS;Active participation in automating processes, and implementing new systems;Making sure the systems are available, well-optimized and well-maintained to meet clients’ expectations;Keeping contacts and coordinating with various departmentsKapcsolattartó / InformationStable long-term work environment;Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions;Benefits and social packages;Comfortable A+ office in Budapest;Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste;Paid English courses and conversation clubs;Opportunities for professional and personal growth;Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs;Support and care from our client's friendly team

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global supplier of software engineering and IT outsourcing services, and they are looking for a Java Developer. You’ll be part of a team of professionals who are ready to find the best tailor-made IT solutions for their multinational clients in various industries and solve complex problems.Elvárások / RequirementsYou will be successful in this role if you have: 
Learnability, engineering thinking, positive mindset, and persistence to achieve the goal;Confident English language knowledge - ability to understand English documentation and formulate and express your thoughts in English;1+ year of relevant experience in JAVA;Working with database (relational or NoSQL) skills;Principles of web applications and HTML and CSS knowledge;Working with Git or other version control system skills;Working with automatic project building system skills (maven, Gradle)
Will be a plus:
Knowledge of Spring and Hibernate frameworks;Knowledge of JavaScript and basic frameworks such as Angular or ReactAmit kínálunk / OfferWhat you will do in the first three months:
Study the necessary technologies according to an individual development plan;Practical study of new material;Complete internship involving real projects with the application of the studied technologiesKapcsolattartó / InformationStable long-term work environment;Competitive salary with a flexible system of revisions;Benefits and social packagesComfortable A+ office in Budapest;Every necessary tool and device in the office will be provided to comfortably perform all project tasks: computers, meeting rooms, spacious modern kitchens with professional coffee machines, comfortable recreation areas with game consoles, board games, and a selection of literature for every taste;Paid English courses and conversation clubs;Opportunities for professional and personal growth;Mentoring program, internal and external professional training programs;Support and care from our client's friendly team
HO opportunity after the trial period

Tesztelés állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.Elvárások / RequirementsFor this challenging position, you ideally have:
in-depth knowledge of software development backend (Java is a plus) and/or front-end (Javascript, Angular, React) developmentsome experience in any kind of leadership role (technical/project/people management or mentoring)solid understanding of the software development lifecycle and agile methodologiesability to collaborate seamlessly and effectively with team members and potentially with the clientgood communication skills in English (spoken and written)a university degree (MSc/BSc)
Nice to have:knowledge and/or practical experience as a coaching type of leaderexperience in working in distributed teamsAmit kínálunk / OfferYou will be responsible for empowering your team members through coaching, mentoring, feedbacks and career development.
From the first day onward you can expect:a dedicated people manager to support youa dedicated project mentor to help your learning infrequent feedback for guidance and further development
After 1 month you will:participate in the in-house leadership program designed for this rolehave our management handbook (toolkit for the role)work with leadership mentors
After 3-6 months (depending on your progress) you will:take over a group of software engineerscoach your team members to continuously develop themselves both personally and professionallyensure that your team members thrive in a safe and positive environment with the right mindset and attitudeconduct regular career conversations and performance reviews with your team membersmake sure that your team members receive constructive feedback frequentlykeep up your team members' motivationbe a member of our leadership communityget support from a leadership mentorparticipate in recruitment (optional)play an active role in company-wide projects (optional)Kapcsolattartó / InformationContinuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner company is a leading Swiss software engineering firm specializing in the design, implementation and integration of large-scale business and security software solutions. Renowned Swiss and German customers from various industries and the public sector rely on their services and products. Their development center in Budapest is continuously growing so they are looking for new experts for our ongoing and brand new projects.Elvárások / RequirementsFor this challenging position, you ideally have:confident knowledge of object oriented programming (Java is a plus) and/orconfident knowledge of front-end (Javascript, Angular, React) or mobile developmentgood communication skills in English (spoken and written)
Nice to have:familiarity with relational databasesexperience in working in distributed teamsAmit kínálunk / OfferIn your daily work, you will:develop effective solutions for complex business problems in various industriesintegrate new components and technologies into existing software systems and architectureswork on all layers of the software stack (web and mobile UI, business layer, database)participate in important project milestones; like estimation, releases, elaboration, etc.maintain and improve code quality (especially through code reviews)give and receive constructive feedbackKapcsolattartó / InformationContinuous personal development and learning:diverse, challenging tasks, a large variety of projects, both in terms of industry and technologydedicated managerial support, helpful colleagues, supportive work culturecareer path: further develop your skills in your areas of expertise, or try yourself out in other parallel fields: project or people management, learning new technologiesinternal and external education, online and offline trainings (technical, soft skill, leadership), conferences
Great team spirit:amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleaguescompany sponsored events (project and company dinners, parties, long weekend in summer)international atmosphere, collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland and Portugal
Flexible working hours
People care:state-of-the-art workspace (small offices, height adjustable desks)fresh fruit daily in the office, free coffeebreakout area with csocsó, xbox, fishpongprivate health insurance from Medicoveron-site massage therapist

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games! They are a dynamic and experienced team in London and Budapest who have set theirselves the goal to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding reach and distribution. They went public on Nasdaq in Stockholm in 2018 and since then they have been picked by Prolific London to be in the top 5 most valuable London based gaming startup.
At the core of their business is their patented technology that makes it possible to add, modify or remove features in compiled games to make them compatible with the requirements of any store without source code change. The technology does not require game developers to do any redevelopment work and does not require access to the game’s source code. It can enhance existing applications by adding features and functionality, such as gifting, in-app billing and several other solutions, primarily to drive revenue and user engagement.Elvárások / RequirementsTechnical skills:
2+ years experience as a Java Developer;Core Java and unit testing knowledge;Agile experience;Good SQL knowledge, preferably MySQL;A good understanding of HTTP protocol;Few years of work experience in related areas
Soft Skills:
Passion for technology, preferably within mobile space;Critical mindset and strong problem-solving ability;Enthusiastic and optimistic mindset;Strong ability and willingness to learn;Good communication skills, both verbal and written;Good interpersonal and team work skills;A passion for delivering high quality solutions
Education:
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the fieldAmit kínálunk / OfferAs a Java Developer at our partner you will be part of thier highly efficient and collaborative Agile teams where you will be designing, building and maintaining features that replace some of their existing functionalities with state of the art technologies and add new business features. As part of the role you will have the opportunity to deep dive into the core of the Android platform and their billing services.
Key Activities:
Design and build the next iteration of the state of the art their software;Cooperate with other cross-functional teams to define and design platform improvement components and core features of their platform;Work with external data sources and APIs provided by companies like PayPal, Samsung and Amazon;Test your code (unit test, feature test) for robustness, including edge cases, usability, performance and reliability;Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request to the platformKapcsolattartó / InformationEligibility for share option packageCompany mobile phoneTrainingsCompany eventsCompetitive salary

Backend Engineer (Scala) - protect team állás Budapest
Docker
AWS
Scala
Apache
remote
Back-end fejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAt our Client they are on a mission to modernize voice with trust, identity, and intelligence. They are protecting everyday people from spam and fraud calls, connecting businesses with their customers, and helping carriers secure their networks for all. In 2015, the Company founder saw the increasing need for innovation in the voice channel and began building the first caller ID and spam blocking apps for mobile while at Whitepages. In early 2016, the Company spun out of Whitepages and brought its technology to market through Samsung Smart Call, the first-ever network-based spam solution with AT&T, and the our Client's consumer app. Three years later in 2019, they brought our Client connect to market, a B2B branded call service that enables enterprise companies to connect to the consumers they are trying to reach. The combination of Protect, Connect, and the app has resulted in the world's largest Voice Performance Platform with over 200M monthly active users.Elvárások / RequirementsExperience or interest in functional programming in a typed setting; 
A philosophy of iteration and continuous improvement;
Experience building highly scalable and -available production services;
BSc or M.S in a relevant field; 2+ years relevant work experience;
Excellent communication and self-organization skills incl. working within and with other remote teams;
Familiar with data storage- and processing systems (such as Postresql, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Redshift, Apache Spark, ElasticSearch, Redis);
Experience with *nix.
Proficient at collaborating and communicating with both local and remote team members in English and Hungarian
You will have a fast start if you have experience with:
Scala
Cloud environments (AWS)
Big-data technologies and platforms (Spark, Athena/Presto, Zeppelin, Databricks)
Modern deployment environments (Kubernetes, Docker)
High performance HTTP APIAmit kínálunk / OfferAbout the Position
The Backend Engineer is an Individual contributor position responsible for designing, coding and operating high performance data processing systems and backend services for their customer facing web services on the JVM platform (primarily Scala). Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand their entire stack, from their cloud platform (AWS) through data storage technologies (such as DynamoDB, Redshift) and stream processing (Kafka) all the way to Scala/akka based services.
About the Team
Our Client's Protect team has built a leading fraud detection system for phone calls used by millions of users around the Globe through mobile and network integrations. Their mission is to eliminate unwanted calls and bring trust and intelligence back to the phone calls by using modern technologies and machine learning. Their innovative platform is able to process hundreds of thousands requests and runs half million models per second.
What You’ll Do
Work at a supportive and fast-growing startup with a fantastic team.
Build and operate world class services in the field of phone fraud detection
Make an impact in the lives of tens of millions of consumers on a daily basis
Collaborate and learn from other great team members.
Support in developing your skills and accelerating your careerKapcsolattartó / InformationPrivate Retirement/Pension program 
Medicover
Commuter benefit, parking facility, bike storage
Donation Matching for a charity of your choice (up to $500/ year)
WFH equipment stipend 
$1,000/year in Professional Development funds
Online English Classes
Gym membership
Full-flex working model (You decide whether you are working from home or from the office.)

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.Elvárások / RequirementsProfound education in Computer Science, Information Technology or Information Systems (Master, Bachelor or comparable) or equivalent working experience
3+ years experience in Java development and enterprise solution design / implementation
3+ years experience with relational database systems
Experience designing and developing integrated enterprise applications
Experience with source control management systems
Experience with multi-threading and concurrency
Experience with debugging, performance profiling and optimization
Excellent understanding of object-oriented and service-oriented application development concepts
Fluent English in spoken and written
Personality:
Sociable personality and communication skills
Highly developed analytical skills and systematic way of working
Independent and proactive way of working
Result oriented and practical thinking
Willingness to constantly educate oneself
Interested in working in a multicultural environment and teamAmit kínálunk / OfferParticipate in an international team rolling out global solutions for industrial business
Responsible for software architecture and design based on business requirements
Responsible for implementation and development of business applications
Responsible for reliability and quality of implemented application
Strong collaboration with product owner and development team
Design and develop new features based Java SDK
Provide technical leadership to teammates through coaching and mentorship
Responsible for continuous development of the development guidelines and documentation
Contribution to continuous improvement of development methodology and processesKapcsolattartó / InformationA modern office in the 11th district is waiting for you to support your creativity with fun community places, cafe rooms, an own cinema and a skybar
You can be part of a successful and growing company in the field of technology
They support you with flexible working hours and home office opportunity (60% of the working time in many of their positions)
Competitive salary and wide range of other benefits (cafeteria & bonus) are provided to you
You can learn new languages in small groups, selecting from 5 languages
They organize leisure time activities (board games, sport activities)

We are looking for a Lead developer to be part of their team. Elvárások / RequirementsSuccessfully completed studies in the field of (business) computer science, business (engineering) or a comparable subject;Very experienced in developing IT architectures;Several years of professional experience in the field of software development / full stack, cloud, microservices and knowledge of infrastructure and operationsSystematic application of methods for requirements analysis and agile software development (Scrum, Kanban, UX) as well as systematic application of standards in IT service management (IT-PEP, ITIL, DevOps);Technology stack: extensive knowledge of Java and JavaScript, Docker, MS Azure and databases including graph databases;Fluency in written and spoken EnglishAmit kínálunk / OfferYour Tasks will be:

DevOps Engineer in Platform Engineering állás Budapest
Mysql

GCP

IT management állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsEducated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in Ops/DevOps or software development
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
Skills that drive success in this role:
Unix/Linux/Bash, setting up and managing virtual servers. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what we do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
Clean coding skills. We are always expanding the areas where we apply the “infrastructure as code” approach. We write new code and we carefully review the code of our colleagues, ranging from small infrastructure automation scripts, continuous integration support, to more complex backend code.
Kubernetes, Helm. We continue migrating more of our services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
SQL, MySQL. We manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. We use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. We aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and we rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but we don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role:
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
JUnit/TestNG
GitOps, CDK, EKS, Flux
CI/CD pipelines, JenkinsAmit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend their AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of their platform and participate in their journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of infrastructure Ops, DevOps, and full-stack Software Engineering.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole worldKapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement

Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsSkills that drive success in this role
Java, clean coding skills. Some of our most impactful changes are done on the software backend side of the services that we run and we use Java even for the automation of our platform itself.
Spring Boot. We provide standardised service setup to other dev teams and this industry standard framework is an integral part of it.
Unix/Linux/Bash. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what they do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
SQL, MySQL. They manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Kubernetes, Helm. They continue migrating more of their services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. They use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. They aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and they rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but they don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role
JUnit/TestNG
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Git
GitOps (Flux)
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
Further requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in software development or Ops/DevOps
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
 Amit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend our AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of our platform and participate in our journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of backend Software Engineering and infrastructure Ops/DevOps.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the Flexion platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
 Kapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.Elvárások / Requirements4-6 years Strong Technical experience in supporting and implementing Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines for Databricks, Azure ML, AKS etc
Strong experience with Azure Cloud infrastructure e.g deploying infrastructure, Networking, Security, Firewall etc.
Strong experience with Terraform/PowerShell/ARM scripting.
Strong Experience with Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine, Log Analytics and Express Route.Amit kínálunk / OfferResponsible for Platform operations, Platform support, Infrastructure deployment in Microsoft Azure environment.
Implement Container services with Platform (AKS)
Implement new platform functionalities to enhance platform capabilities
Work with Cloud Security team to implement security of platform including Firewall, Networking, NSG rules.
Azure Monitoring, Scaling, Availability, and performance/Utilization measurement
Coordinate for Backups, updates & maintenance for onPrem solutionsKapcsolattartó / InformationStable company background and long-term working possibility
Full of challenges and high-level professional activities at an international company
Participation in international projects and commission to foreign countries
Career opportunities, continuous training program and language courses
Competitive salary and performance-related bonus
Cafeteria with optional elements
School start support

Experience in developer platforms like GitHub and GitLab; intrinsic bias towards simplicity and writing clean, maintainable and testable code
Experience in several of the technologies Azure Functions, App Services, Event Hubs, IoT Hub, Azure Data Explorer, Application Insights, Azure
Experience in optimizing platform security and performance
Team oriented, hands-on mentality and result-driven attitude

strong command of written and spoken English

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client has more than 40 years of research and development in the field of lottery systems made their company a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products. With more than 170 employees in Budapest, currently serves more than 400 customers on six continents today.Elvárások / RequirementsGraduation in a technical college or university;You have minimum 2 years of software development experience in full time job;Technical experience: Server developer: Java, Oracle database and PL/SQL; and good to have: Java EE, WebLogic, LinuxClient developer: Java, Linux, Swing, shellYou have effective problem solving skill in a multi-component system;You want to use your structured thinking and analytical skills;You are able to work in a team or independently;You would like to use your excellent English on a daily basisAmit kínálunk / OfferThe following Challenges await You: Software development (analysis, design, implementation, integration) in the area of lottery systems in cooperation with developers of other components;Maintenance, support and assistance in test and operation of the system;Taking responsibility for the assigned software components;Working according to company development processes (ISO9000, Scrum/Kanban, SAFE4);Continuous improvement of development environment and processes Kapcsolattartó / InformationCompetitive payment package (13. and 14. months salaries, Home Office package)Cafeteria and Health insuranceMentoring Program, TrainingsFlexible work schedule, full timeDowntown office, in the heart of Budapest, at the foot of Buda castle (easily accessible by public transport)Indoor bike and motorcycle storageRecreation room: table soccer, darts and saunaTeam buildingsExcellent working atmosphere Open company cultureEconomically stable and growing enterprise Non-conventional domain: lottery and sports games

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client has more than 40 years of research and development in the field of lottery systems made their company a worldwide leading supplier of lottery products. With more than 170 employees in Budapest, currently serves more than 400 customers on six continents today.Elvárások / RequirementsCompleted education in computer science or IT;You can share us some details about your knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML and CSS, Angular knowledge is required and you can prove it with experience of minimum 4 years;Your knowledge of Java and web technologies is strong;You have knowledge of best practices (security, design patterns, responsive design, test frameworks, continuous integration and deployment);You have the following strengths: personal initiative and engagement, high level of quality awareness, accuracy and team spirit in a distributed, international team;You would like to use your excellent English on a daily basisAdvantageous for the position: Experience in GIT, Mercurial or similar version control system, Gradle, Jenkins, REST, gRPC, RxJs, @ngrx/store, xstate, SonarQubeAmit kínálunk / OfferThe following Challenges await You: Development of their cross-platform front-end application in Java and JavaScript running on different devices such as traditional lottery terminals in retailer shops, self-service terminals and mobile devices (tablet/mobile) running on different operating systems (Linux, Windows, Android);Architecture, design, implementation and testing in an agile environment (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe);Implementation of new architecture principles in the new software generationKapcsolattartó / InformationCompetitive payment package (13. and 14. months salaries, Home Office package)Cafeteria and Health insuranceMentoring Program, TrainingsFlexible work schedule, full timeDowntown office, in the heart of Budapest, at the foot of Buda castle (easily accessible by public transport)Indoor bike and motorcycle storageRecreation room: table soccer, darts and saunaTeam buildingsExcellent working atmosphere Open company cultureEconomically stable and growing enterprise Non-conventional domain: lottery and sports games

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Business Service Center is a German family-owned automotive company, and they would like to represent themselves also in the Hungarian market. They are planning to hire 350 new employees, and they will have a brand new office in Budapest. New colleagues will have a chance to join a new company and to make decisions on professional topics. These employees who add their own ideas would be prioritized by the management of the company. Fluent English is necessary to use for everyday work.Elvárások / Requirements
University degree with a focus on IT or similar qualification/training
3 or more years of experience
Experienced working in an international, virtual team
Deep SAP knowledge in the area of SAP-WM/IM and in the surrounding SAP modules
Knowledge about automatic warehouses and interface technology via IDOCs
Good English skills (spoken and written)
Amit kínálunk / OfferAs an IT specialist various enhancements and optimizations will be customized in SAP WM/M to support our logistics departments in their daily work. The main focus of this position is the interface to our automatic warehouses and the setup and optimization of these processes as well.
Main tasks, roles, and responsibilities:
Detailing the solution design in close cooperation with our logistics solution architects
Customizing in SAP to fulfill business requirements
Contact to the business for automatic warehouses
Steering of external consultants
Creation of programming requests for our internal development team or for external programmers
Testing
Special Tasks/Key challenges:
Support of processes in the area of automatic warehouses and the interface to SAP ERP
Participation in the S/4 rollout
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Professional development opportunities
Competitive salary
Dynamic atmosphere
Home-office possibility
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

SAP Project Coordinator állás Budapest
SAP
SAP állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentPartnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatunkba keresünk IT Project Coordinator kollégát elsősorban SAP-val kapcsolatos projektekhez. Amennyiben rendelkezel mély és átfogó SAP szoftver tudással és IT Project Manager képzeled el a jövődet, akkor ez a lehetőség egy remek első lépés lehet. Elvárások / Requirements
Elvárások:
Legyen felsőfokú végzettséged lehetőleg informatikai, vagy villamosmérnök területen vagy folyamatban lévő tanulmányaid.
Magas szintű SAP ismeret és releváns munkatapasztalat (R3 és/vagy S4Hana rendszer ismerete)
1-2 év vállalati oldali tapasztalatod van SAP üzemeltetésben vagy SAP bevezetési projektben.
Ismerd a legfontosabb informatikai rendszereket és folyamatokat.
Természetesen kezeld, ha angolul kell tárgyalnod.
Gondolkodj ügyfélközpontúan, és tudj magabiztosan szervezni.
Ügyesen kommunikálj a felhasználótól a külsős beszállítókig bárkivel.
Légy együttműködő, és nyitott a frappáns megoldásokra.
“B” kategóriás jogosítványodat gyakorlatban is tudd használni.
Előnyök:
Gazdasági, informatikai, vagy villamosmérnök területen szerzett felsőfokú végzettség vagy folyamatban lévő tanulmányok.
SAP R3 és/vagy S4Hana rendszer ismerete.
SAP Success Factors és SAP Ariba ismerete.
BI rendszerek ismerete.
Üzleti rendszerek bevezetésében szerzett projekt tapasztalat.
 Amit kínálunk / OfferFeladatok:
SAP on-premise és SAP Cloud modulokhoz kapcsolódó projektek vezetése és hozzá kapcsolódó IT feladatokat összefogása.
Meglévő rendszereken nagyobb mértékű változtatások, új funkciók kialakítása.
Részvétel nagy komplexitású, vállalati projektekben, IT oldali projekt tagként.
Együttműködés az üzleti területekkel (belső megrendelő), az üzleti folyamatok átlátása, az üzleti igényekhez megfelelő informatikai megoldások keresése.
Kapcsolattartás a SAP fejlesztő cégekkel, SAP tanácsadókkal.  
Együttműködés a többi IT területtel a szerverüzemeltetési, hálózati és cybersecurity kérdésekben.
Az ötlet felmerülésétől, a legjobb megoldás kiválasztásán keresztül a végső megvalósításig terjed majd a feladatod.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség.
Egyedi, különleges munkakörnyezet.
Nyitott, segítőkész légkör, összetartó csapat. 
Hibrid munkavégzés. 
A fejlesztések szinte minden lépése in-house történik, így láthatod egy folyamat minden apró mozzanatát.
Saját kisebb projektek gazdája leszel, így a sikerélmények sem maradnak el.
Folyamatosan bővülő, szakmailag elkötelezett csapat, ahol építheted karrieredet.
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza
Tovább a hirdetőhöz

Linux
IT Support állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentHa van tapasztalatod IT üzemeltetésben, úgy érzed megállnád a helyed a kritikus rendszerek működtetésében, profin koordinálnád azokat, és biztos támogatója lennél a partnercégünk infrastruktúrájának, akkor jelentkezz Rendszeradminisztrátori pozíciónkba.
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatukba keresünk új kollégát. Elvárások / RequirementsElvárások:
Rendelkezz középfokú végzettséggel informatikai vagy villamosmérnök területen
Minimum 1 év releváns üzemeltetési tapasztalat
Alapszintű MS Windows és Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
Középfokon tudj kommunikálni angolul szóban és írásban
“B” kategóriás jogosítványodat gyakorlatban is tudd használni
Nyitottan állj egy-egy új helyzet megoldásához, ügyesen szervezz folyamatokat
Kommunikálj hatékonyan és barátságosan
Légy önálló, és talpraesett, de ha szükséges, merj támaszkodni a csapatra
Előnyök:
Felsőfokú végzettség informatikai vagy villamosmérnök területen
TCP/IP hálózati ismeretek (például CCNA ismerettel egyenértékű tudás)
haladó szintű Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
hyper-converged infrastructure ismeretek (Vmware vCenter és vSAN ismeretek)
kritikus, 7x24 órás rendszerek üzemeltetési tapasztalat
Amit kínálunk / OfferFeladatok:
Partnercégünk IT osztályának kezelésében lévő adathálózat és kommunikációs infrastruktúra 2. szintű, és bizonyos esetekben 3. szintű támogatási szolgáltatásának biztosítása.
Az ISO20000 alapú „Problem Management” és „Change Management” folyamataival összhangban a problémákhoz és a karbantartásokhoz, rendszer változásokhoz tartozó esetek és jegyek kezelése és dokumentálása.
Szakmai kapcsolattartás az informatikai beszállítókkal és a 3. szintű támogatói csoportokkal. Kapcsolattartás a kulcsfelhasználókkal.
Rendszer tesztelések – infrastruktúra és felhasználói -, leszervezése, támogatása és dokumentálása.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség
Egyedi, különleges munkakörnyezet
Nyitott, segítőkész légkör
Hosszú távú fejlődési lehetőség
Egyedülálló, speciális informatikai rendszerek és berendezések
Hibrid munkavégzés
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is launching several new projects in Hungary focusing on delivering solutions to their clients. 
They are among the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world. They are insights-driven and outcome-based to help accelerate returns on IT and business investments.
In all they do, their goal is to build trusted relationships through client proximity, providing industry and technology expertise to help meet the needs of customers and citizens. Elvárások / Requirements5+ years experience in Java, JEE, Spring Framework;Architecture Styles: Micro Services, SOA;Communication Technologies: Rest, Swagger, SOAP, JMS, Kafka;Databases: Oracle DB, Hibernate, JPA;Testing: Junit, Mockito, AssertJ, Selenium;CI/CD: Jenkins, Git, Gitlab, Jira;Modeling: UML;Monitoring: Splunk, Prometheus, Elastic Search;IDE: Eclipse;Cloud: AWS, EC2, Docker, Openshift;English and German language knowledgeAmit kínálunk / OfferAs a Java Developer you will evelop and maintain applications and enterprise solutions for our clients located in Germany and globally. You will develop applications from scratch, implement change request fixes for bugs and new enhancements, and develop enterprise delivery pipelines. Would a position in DevOps and Full-Stack sound appealing to you? 
You will be part of our international team and will make contributions that will build customer value by creating modern, state-of-the-art end-user experiences. The teamwork is agile so there will be a lot of direct interactions. You will be in touch not only with your other team members locally but also with representatives of the customer and a variety of external teams globally. Kapcsolattartó / InformationLong-term opportunity within a fast growing companySupportive cultureHome office Competitive salary

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur global Client is looking for their new Java Developer colleague who can take part in designing common modules for various products which provide optimal support for airlines! 
By joining one of their teams you will have a possibility to use a wide range of Java technologies and to work together with German and Hungarian teams.Elvárások / RequirementsYou will be successful if you have:
Practical experience in design and development in Java applications (at least 3 years)Good Object Oriented Programming and Design skillsGood knowledge of English both spoken and writtenStrong analytical and problem solving skillsHave professional experience in working with the technology stackLike working on projects with high responsibilityHave solution-focused approachAmit kínálunk / OfferYou will be responsible for:
Designing, implementing and testing new functionalitiesMaintain the current systemKeeping contact and cooperating with teams located in Hungary and in Germany, ensure smooth and active communication with co-workers and associated partners
You will deal with the following technologies, tools and frameworks:
Java Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security, Spring Integration, Spring Cloud)RESTful servicesMicroservicesOracle, PostgreSQL, SQLHibernateMaven, GitJira, ConfluenceDockerKapcsolattartó / InformationWhat are the benefits of joining Our Partner as an employee?
Even when you work hard, you will still have time for your personal life: their flexible working hours based on core time, the exact observance of the designated number of working hours and the benefits that can be extended to cover your family you can also improve your non-working life!
They have long-term plans for you! They have carefully designed career paths (and a career management system), they provide the appropriate training courses and projects to accomplish your aims.
Their community is characterized by mutual respect and an attitude of helpfulness. This high professional quality level and the colorful personalities will help you spend your everyday life in a good mood, why you make the best of your skills and talents.
In addition to an inclusive and helpful atmosphere, trust is also an important value for the company. You can rely on Our Partner with anything right from your first day. 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur prestigious German client operates as an unique electronic and software developer competence center, specialized in the field of electronic steering systems, they are one of the leading multinational companies in the automotive industry, whose main focus is to create and provide high-tech development solutions to its partners.Elvárások / Requirements
Electrical Engineer or IT degree (BSc/MSc)
On medior level 3+ years of embedded development background
Knowledge of analog and digital hardware for hardware-based programming
Knowledge of measuring tools for developing and testing
Fluent English is a must, German not required but nice to have it
Experience in MATLAB/Simulink/Python/AUTOSAR/MISRA C is an advantage
Engine control system or test system development background is also a plus
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Full cycle ECU (Electrical Control Unit) development, servo control supplement and operation system development in embedded C
Plan and execute embedded systems, prepare software requirements
Implementing and integrating requests coming from clients (automotive industry), internal electronics development and testing
Documentation considering security processes, delivering technical design, end-to-end software implementation, module level testing in C
Keep in touch with architects, software integrators and project leaders
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Mentor programming, have the chance to learn from the most experienced colleagues
Flexible working time
Amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleagues
Participating in international projects
Providing language courses
Competitive salary and other benefits
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
